00014 class BdkDP {
00015 public:
00016   // STATIC MEMBERS:
00017   // Directly Dalitz-plot related:
00018   static double edge() {return 3.0;}  // edge of the DP
00019   static double mD() {return 1.8645;}
00020   static double m3() {return 0.139570;}  // pi+ mass
00021   static double m2() {return 0.139570;}  // pi- mass
00022   static double m1() {return 0.139570;}  // pi0 mass
00023   static double mDsq() {return mD()*mD();}
00024   static double m3sq() {return m3()*m3();}  // pi+ mass
00025   static double m2sq() {return m2()*m2();}  // pi- mass
00026   static double m1sq() {return m1()*m1();}  // pi0 mass
00027   static double s13Max() {return mD()*mD() + m1()*m1() - 2 * mD() * m2();}
00028 
00029   static double s13Min(Double_t s12);
00030   static double s13Max(Double_t s12);
00031 
00032   static double sumMasses2() {
00033     return mD()* mD() + m1()* m1() + m2()* m2() + m3()* m3();
00034   }
00035 
00036   static double symValue() {return sumMasses2() / 3;}
00037   static BdkP2 symPoint() {return BdkP2(symValue(), symValue());}
00038 
00039   static Bool_t inBox(const BdkP2 & point);
00040   static Bool_t inDalitz(const BdkP2 & point);
00041 
00042   // Tolerance for floating-point operations where comparison between
00043   // numbers is involved:
00044   static double tolerance() {return 1.e-10;}
00045 
00046 
00047   // Graphics:
00048   static void drawBoundary(int npoints = 200, 
00049                            int color = kBlack, 
00050                            int width = 2, 
00051                            int style = 1);
00052 
00053   static TLine * line(const BdkP2 & p1, const BdkP2 & p2, 
00054                       int color = kBlack, int width = 1, 
00055                       int style = 1);
00056   
00057   static TLine * line(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, 
00058                       int color = kBlack, int width = 1, 
00059                       int style = 1);
00060   
00061   static TLine * lineEdge(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, 
00062                           int color = kBlack, int width = 1, 
00063                           int style = 1);  
00064   
00065   static TLine * lineEdgeSlope(double x1, double y1, double slope, 
00066                                int color = kBlack, int width = 1, 
00067                                int style = 1);
00068

00070   static TLine * drawE13Line();
00071   static TLine * drawE23Line();
